body: @Hachet idk what'd you say but, DAMN YOU COMMENT IS 3 YEARS AND 6 MONTHS OLD

May: This feels weird.

Dawn: May I don't think these two are who they say they are.

Perverts: Fooled you both. *both get tapped on the shoulder* Huh?

Me: *cracks knuckles* You two have 10 seconds to start running before I rip your heads off!

Perverts: *start running*
